org.maltparser.core.lw.parser

Class LWDecisionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.maltparser.core.lw.parser.LWDecisionModel

  • public final class LWDecisionModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A lightweight version of the decision models, the guide model and the instance models located in org.maltparser.parser.guide.{decision,instance} and can only be used in parsing mode. It is also limited to predict at most two decisions.
    Author:
    Johan Hall
